snippet: A golden lab puppy who refuses to leave his Clydesdale “bud” won plaudits; a Coca-Cola spot evoking the nation’s multicultural populace drew mostly positive reactions, but some raw comments as well.
abstract: Advertising column; annual data after Super Bowl indicates that commercials during game that did best among consumers were feel-good spots meant to be uplifting, inspirational, nostalgic or patriotic; spot most discussed, liked and shared most was Anheuser-Busch ad for Budweiser beer featuring golden lab puppy.
lead_paragraph: A golden lab puppy who refuses to leave his Clydesdale “bud” won plaudits; a Coca-Cola spot evoking the nation’s multicultural populace drew mostly positive reactions, but some raw comments as well.

headline.main: ‘Puppy Love’ Warms Hearts; Diversity Draws Mixed Response
headline.print_headline: ‘Puppy Love’ Warms Hearts; Diversity Draws Mixed Response
